headline: Ask HN: Is Elixir Done?
description:
Hi all I've been a great supporter and a fan of the Elixir language and having built huge codebases of my side projects in it, I could feel the robustness and also enjoy the general nature of FP. There were, times when things felt more difficult and challenging compared to Ruby, which was something I was very proficient at before then.

Looks like the trend for Elixir Posts and activity on this forum is in the decline now, was wondering what happened to it?! Are people moving away from it already?
description_zh-Hans:
大家好 我一直是Elixir语言的忠实支持者和粉丝，我用它构建了我的副业项目的巨大代码库，我可以感受到它的健壮性，也很喜欢FP的一般性质。

现在看来，这个论坛上的Elixir帖子和活动呈下降趋势，不知道发生了什么？人们是否已经远离了它？
description_zh-Hant:
大家好 我一直是Elixir語言的忠實支持者和粉絲，我用它構建了我的副業項目的巨大代碼庫，我可以感受到它的健壯性，也很喜歡FP的一般性質。

現在看來，這個論壇上的Elixir帖子和活動呈下降趨勢，不知道發生了什麼？人們是否已經遠離了它？
